title: Ultimate Shit-Stirrer Spencer Pratt Just Spilled Some Spicy Miley / Liam / Kaitlynn Tea
text:
Everyone in the Pedestrian.TV office is sipping on lemon and ginger tea as the flu continues to threaten Sydney like the black plague, meanwhile I’ve traded the citrus for an even sweeter kind of tea: Miley Cyrus and Liam Hemsworth tea.

Following their v. public split, Miley appeared to waste no time in the recovery period by immediately moving on with Brody Jenner’s ex Kaitlynn Carter, but while punters were shook over how quick she found a new bae, it turns out the pair have been on for months now.

Shade king Spencer Pratt has weighed in on Kaitlynn and Miley’s red hot romance, revealing that they were dating during the filming of The Hills: New Beginnings.

“It’s tough for me to listen to Kaitlynn complain about people talking about her allegedly open relationship with Brody when we know she had a thing going with Miley,” Pratt wrote in his latest recap of the series.

“She already had something going on with her when these scenes were filming — maybe not physically, but definitely emotionally.”

“No one’s judging you for whatever it is you and Brody do when he’s not sleeping in his car,” he continued, referencing an earlier episode when Jenner slept in his car after the couple got into a fight.

“We just don’t want people to lie about their lives.”

“Maybe you shouldn’t have gone on television,” he added. “It’s called a reality show, hon. And the reality is that Brody’s been talking about your sex life on his podcast for years.”

When cheating rumours started after their highly publicised divorce, Miley took to Twitter to allege that she never cheated on her Aussie boo.

“I can accept that the life I’ve chosen means I must live completely open and transparent with my fans who I love, and the public, 100% of the time,” she tweeted.

“What I cannot accept is being told I’m lying to cover up a crime I haven’t committed. I have nothing to hide.”

Though Cyrus acknowledged that she’s cheated in previous relationships, she insisted that she has always been faithful to Hemsworth.

“The truth is, once Liam & I reconciled, I meant it, & I was committed. There are NO secrets to uncover here,” she wrote. “I can admit to a lot of things but I refuse to admit that my marriage ended because of cheating. Liam and I have been together for a decade. I’ve said it before & it remains true, I love Liam and always will.”

Sad times, mates.
description: The Hills: New Beginnings star Spencer Pratt just revealed some spicy details about Miley Cyrus cheating on Liam Hemsworth with Kaitlynn Carter.
